description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) Following careful investigation, full schedule of works which indicates extent and location of brickwork which is proposed to be replaced and means of removal of brickwork and any cementitious mortar; b) Detailed design of new buttresses at a scale of 1:10; c) Sample of new brickwork; d) Details of mortar mix and sample of new pointing; e) New trellis at scale of 1:20, including materials, finish and means of fixing) of Listed Building consent LB/24/05569 (Works to stabilise and conserve rear garden wall)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Basement/ground Floor Flat, 15 Kensington Square, LONDON, W8 5HH
